mapper.select: select '用户总金币' as name,sum(gold) as value from htt_app_user where blackList=0

select '当日用户金币' as name,sum(a.gold) as value from (select * from htt_award_his where createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime}) a, (select * from htt_app_user where blackList=0) b where a.phoneNum=b.phoneNum and createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime} and awardType not in (8,15)
select '当日新增用户数' as name,count(1) as value from htt_app_user where blackList=0 and registerDate>=#{lastHour} and registerDate<#{currentTime}

select '当日全部邀请奖励' as name,sum(a.gold) as value from (select * from htt_award_his where createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime}) a, (select * from htt_app_user where blackList=0) b where a.phoneNum=b.phoneNum and createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime} and awardType in (2)

select '当日全部阅读奖励' as name,sum(a.gold) as value from (select * from htt_award_his where createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime}) a, (select * from htt_app_user where blackList=0) b where a.phoneNum=b.phoneNum and createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime} and awardType in (4)

select '当日全部其他奖励' as name,sum(a.gold) as value from (select * from htt_award_his where createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime}) a, (select * from htt_app_user where blackList=0) b where a.phoneNum=b.phoneNum and createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime} and awardType not in (2,4,8,15)

select '申请提现金额' as name,sum(a.income) as value from (select * from htt_withdraw_his) a, (select * from htt_app_user where blackList=0) b where a.phoneNum=b.phoneNum and withdrawTime>=#{lastHour} and withdrawTime<#{currentTime} and withdrawType=#{withdrawType}

select '成功打款金额' as name,sum(a.income) as value from (select * from htt_withdraw_his) a, (select * from htt_app_user where blackList=0) b where a.phoneNum=b.phoneNum and a.updateDate>=#{lastHour} and a.updateDate<#{currentTime} and withdrawType=#{withdrawType} and statusType in (2,3)
select '预计总支出金额' as name,sum(a.income) as value from (select * from htt_withdraw_his) a, (select * from htt_app_user where blackList=0) b where a.phoneNum=b.phoneNum and statusType in (1,6)
select '实际已支出总金额' as name,sum(a.income) as value from (select * from htt_withdraw_his) a, (select * from htt_app_user where blackList=0) b where a.phoneNum=b.phoneNum and statusType in (2,3)
